definition: 4 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + Peptide 2-(3-carboxy-3-aminopropyl)-L-histidine <=> 4 S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + Peptide diphthine methyl ester
name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:2-[(3S)-3-carboxy-3-aminopropyl]-L-histidine-[translation elongation factor 2] methyltransferase (diphthine methyl ester-[translation elongation factor 2]-forming)
